# gux-panel-frame

The frame of a single panel. Also contains the panel header, body and footer.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Slots

| Slot       | Description             |
| ---------- | ----------------------- |
| `"body"`   | slot for body content   |
| `"footer"` | slot for footer content |
| `"header"` | slot for header content |
